channel.title: Rune Legacy bug fix
channel.description:
Hello, I am using Rune Legacy and I found a glitch. When you die you stay dead at the emote and you do not respawn in Edgeville. You just stay dead. Can you help me out?
NUMP THX TO POLL ACCOUNT
thx
